summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CareerIQ MVP - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working perfectly. Backend has 100% API success rate, frontend has polished UI with seamless navigation and file upload functionality.
passed_tests: POST /api/upload accepts resume and LinkedIn PDF files
All LLM pipeline endpoints exist and respond
Landing page loads with hero section and pricing tiers
File upload zones are visible and functional
LinkedIn guide toggle works with detailed instructions
Form validation works (continue button disabled without files)
Progress indicators and navigation elements work
All CTA buttons and pricing navigation work correctly
